meanings.definition: relating to or located in the caecum

meanings.definition: of or relating to a blind-ended tube in the digestive system
meanings.sent1: The caecal tube aids in the absorption of nutrients.
meanings.sent2: Food passes through the caecal tube for further processing.
meanings.sent3: The caecal tube got lost in the maze of intestines.
